name: Ricochet (itch) (MuFake)
description:
"A puzzle shooter where you need to miss them, to hit them."

Ricochet is a game where the player is forced to ricochet bullets to deal damage in combat and to complete puzzles. With 4 different weapons with unique characteristics this game may, or may not, challenge your skill. 

This game was my final year project for my University course for Game Design. It has been in development for the past year. It was a lot of fun to make this, there were some hardships and times of doubt, but its finally here.

Credits: 

Robert Ramsay [Tri-planar wall shader and other help]

Donelle Quagraine [Music and weapon sound effects]

Mindaugas Juodvirsis [Everything else...]
